### Welcome to my personal website!

I am a PhD student in the [Department of Engineering Management and Systems Engineering](http://emse.seas.gwu.edu/) at the George Washington University. Through my research I aim to understand how we can leverage emerging transportation technologies for the benefit of, rather than detriment to, society.
